Package kin.env.geom

Class Rect

java.lang.Object
kin.env.geom.Geom2D
kin.env.geom.Rect
public class Rect
extends Geom2D
A 2D rectangle, parallel to x- and y-axis.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

      public double[][] getPoly2D()

    • nearest

      public double[][] nearest​(double x, double y)
      Description copied from class: Geom2D
      Get a point on the geometry's border that is nearest to the given point. In addition to Geom2D.nearestBorderPoint(double, double) the normal is returned. If the nearest point is a corner, two normals of connected lines are returned.
      Specified by:
      nearest in class Geom2D
      Parameters:
      x - point to check x
      y - point to check y
      Returns:
      array with [0]: nearest border point x,y [1] or [1], [2] unit normal vectors that point to the free space

    • intersectingBorderPoint

      public double[] intersectingBorderPoint​(double innerX, double innerY, double outerX, double outerY)
      Description copied from class: Geom2D
      Get the intersection of the straight line (inner, outer) with the geometry's border. It is expected the inner point is actually inside the geometry; the outer point must be outside. This will not be checked. If not true, the result maybe wrong.
      Specified by:
      intersectingBorderPoint in class Geom2D
      Parameters:
      innerX - inner point x
      innerY - inner point y
      outerX - outer point x
      outerY - outer point y
      Returns:
      intersecting border point

    • intersectWithLineOfSight

      public double[] intersectWithLineOfSight​(double viewpointX, double viewpointY, double deltaX, double deltaY)
      Description copied from class: Geom2D

      Get the intersection of a line of sight (viewpoint+i·delta). This is the first intersection point from the view point.

      Note that the line of sight has a finite length delta.
      Specified by:
      intersectWithLineOfSight in class Geom2D
      Parameters:
      viewpointX - view point x
      viewpointY - view point y
      deltaX - delta (viewing) vector x
      deltaY - delta (viewing) vector y
      Returns:
      array of 3: [0]: x, [1]: y, [2] portion of the delta vector (0...1). Result may be null for no intersection

    • isInsideMBR

      public boolean isInsideMBR​(double minX, double minY, double maxX, double maxY)
      Description copied from class: Geom2D
      Is the geometry completely inside a minimum bounding rect?

      minY - rangle min y

      maxY - rangle max y
      Returns:
      inside MBR?
